What the Critics Say

I experienced something new: an extraordinary meal from a singularly unexpected source. [...] It is difficult to imagine more humble origins than those of the genius now cooking at Gusteau's who is, in this critic's opinion, nothing less than the finest chef in France. I will be returning to Gusteau's soon, hungry for more.

Anton Ego
